ygData.subject: RE: Level 8 Finally
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are only going to get one of the spells you listed below I d have to suggest root. That s a staple of just about every casting class. Soothe is pretty
ygData.messageBody:
If you are only going to get one of the spells you listed below I'd have to
suggest root. That's a staple of just about every casting class. Soothe is
pretty good too, but at level 8 you can still pretty much rely on lull.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Andy Geneslaw [SMTP:skimaster@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:03 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Level 8 Finally
>
> Well, I finally made level 8, and I mus tsay I love the spells! I bought
> Alliance, Chaotic Feedback, Lesser Shielding, and Eye Of Confusion. They
> are all great. However, I didn't have enough money for anything else, so I
> don't know if I should buy Root, Soothe, or Cancel Magic first when I get
> enough. Anyone have any suggestions? Also, could someone give me a
> suggestion as to where to fight? I do not want to go to Crushbone, but the
> Dragon Bones in Steamfont where I am fighting right now are also pretty
> boring. I do not want to take a month to get to the next spell circle like
> I did this time, can anyone help me out?
>
>
> Aginor, Gnomish Enchanter, Fennin Ro
